sections.prompt:
This is the first song of the playlist, Illenium - Afterlife. Introduce the song and the artist in a way that captures attention and sets the tone for the playlist.

Target length: around 650 characters. It may exceed by up to 15% if needed to finish naturally. Never stop mid-sentence.
sections.text:
Good evening, folks! This is your host with the most on Swift Radio, your home for non-techno tunes. As the sun dips below the horizon, it's time to unwind with some soul-stirring melodies. Now, I've got something special lined up for you. It's a track that transcends the boundaries of the ordinary, an auditory adventure, if you will. 

Ladies and gentlemen, allow me to introduce you to none other than Illenium - a maestro whose genius lies in his ability to blend emotive soundscapes with hard-hitting beats. And the masterpiece we're about to drop is his transcendent track, "Afterlife". This piece isn't just music, my friends, it's an experience, a journey into the sublime and the extraordinary.

sections.text: And now, my friends, we're about to journey into the realm of pure, raw emotion and musical brilliance. Get ready to groove to the rhythm of the sensational masterpiece, "02 The Power is mine". This song is an extraordinary creation by the enigmatic artist known only as "[unknown]". A song that resonates with the spirit of freedom, this piece is a powerful testament to the artist's vision. So sit back, turn up the volume, and let the wave of "02 The Power is mine" wash over you. As always, you're tuned in to the right place, Swift Radio, where we keep your musical heart beating. Stay tuned, listeners, there's more to come.

sections.prompt:

sections.text: You're tuned into Swift Radio, where we keep the beats non-techno and the vibes chilled out. We just wrapped up "02 The Power is Mine" by the mysterious artist, [unknown], a tune that's all about harnessing your inner strength and seizing the day. But now, we're about to switch up the tempo a little with a powerful collaboration that's sure to stir your emotions. Get ready for "Schreien!", a stunning piece by the talented ensemble of Paula Carolina, Marti Fischer, Nikolaus Winkelhausen, Marius Fietz, and Johann Seifert. This team of artists knows how to blend their talents into a harmonious symphony that echoes the soul's deepest cries.

sections.text:
[Music fades]

"Hey there, Swift Radio family! You're tuned into the station that keeps the good times rolling and the great tunes flowing. Now, if you're a fan of fresh, soulful sounds, then you're going to love what we've got coming up next. We're about to delve into the beautifully vibrant world of Jarrah Lanes. 

Jarrah Lanes is an Aussie artist who knows how to spin a melody into pure gold. Blending elements of folk, pop, and indie with a touch of down-under spirit, he's gained a reputation for his catchy tracks and heartfelt lyrics. 

And speaking of catchy tracks, we're about to play his latest gem - "Panama". This track is filled with sun-soaked vibes and lyrical depth that'll have you daydreaming about distant shores.

sections.text:
Well, my lovely listeners, we've come to the end of another musical journey here on Swift Radio. As we cue up the last song of our playlist, let's take a moment to appreciate the harmony we've shared today. It's been an incredible medley of non-techno tunes, each one a little piece of our collective soul. 

Now, we're about to play a song that's sure to leave a melody in your hearts. As the final notes fade into the quiet, remember that music is the universal language that connects us all. 

As we part ways, remember, Swift Radio is your home, your haven of beautiful non-techno music. We'll be right here, waiting for you with another carefully curated playlist to add rhythm to your day.
